description:
Fans can relive the first early issues of Sonic's ongoing comic book series in these special 5" x 7 1/2" editions!

Volume 1 collects Sonic #1-4.

Each story is meticulously restored and printed on high-grade paper - so you can feel like you're zipping right alongside the cobalt champion as he saves Knothole Village! Feel the rush!

Reprints issues 1-4 of Sonic the Hedgehog. Sonic meets a bunny who seems to be a double agent. Verti-cal and Horizont-al appear.
name: Volume 1

description: Courtney and Uncle Aloysius continue their European vacation! But after the events of ' The Fire Thief's Tale' can their relationship ever be the same again? It's old world monsters in new world style in the second of two one-shots featuring everybody's favorite pre-teen curmudgeon - Courtney Crumrin!

volume.name: Courtney Crumrin and the Prince of Nowhere

description: Due in part to the Good Man Farson's defeat in Hambry, his forces are momentarily weakened. If Steven Deschain and his gunslingers can mount a surprise attack they will not only defeat Farson, but also destroy the arsenal Farson has acquired to destroy Gilead. But is there a traitor in their midst who will alert Farson to the plan? This one you cannot miss!
name: Part Four

description:
1. "The Kid from Krypton" (Superboy) written by Otto Binder, penciled by Curt Swan and inked by Stan Kaye. Reprinted in Superboy #129
  2. The Amazing Feats of Aqua-Melvin (Aquaman) art by Ramona Fradon
  3. Little Pete humor page by Henry Boltinoff
  4. Magic Ballroom--Superboy's Workshop activity
  5. The Return of Robin Hood (Green Arrow) art by George Papp
  6. Teddy Roosevelt Guardian of Nature public service announcement, written by Jack Schiff, art by Ruben Moreira

Notes:

  • House ad for Tomahawk and Superman
name: The Kid from Krypton

description: It's the holiday season, and the Super Friends are ready to get festive! But they learn no matter what holiday they want to celebrate, Dr. Light will be there to steal the celebration lights!
name: Season Of Light

description: This is itit's all been building to this. The Fallen Angel, Jude and Black Mariah have returned to Bete Noir, wielding the one weapon that may be able to bring Moloch down. The final confrontation of the "Red Horse Riding" storyline as the war for the world reaches its climax, and the balance of power in Bete Noire is forever changed.

name: The Flintstones : Rock Candy Mountain

description: It's the penultimate issue of the miniseries from the mind of legendary movie producer Joel Silver! Gideon Thorne learns the ancient origin of The Other, and the shocking truth ties into just why the satanic Webster wants Gideon exterminated.
name: Lot's Wife

description:
1. The Bubble Gun (Underdog vs. Simon von Sinister)

2. That's About the Size of It! (Underdog vs. Dr. Pipp Squeak)

3. Simon Says "Wrong On!" (puzzles and activities)

4. Dog-Gone Puzzler (Crossword puzzle)

5. March of Comics
name: Underdog

description: Harry Dresden is haunted by dark secrets of his past and stalked by a dangerous gangland king as he confronts the powerful vampiress Bianca and continues his investigation into the bizarre disappearance of businessman Victor Sells.

volume.name: Jim Butcher's The Dresden Files: Storm Front

name: The Best of 2007! : Marvel: Their Biggest Year Ever!

description:
From the Watchers Datalog: When a handful of Earths heroes and villains were kidnapped across several light years to the alien Battleworld to fight a Secret War, Doctor Doom thought hed successfully stolen the power of the cosmic entity called the Beyonder. However, Doom was unaware he had only stolen a portion of the Beyonders near limitless abilities and the tables were turned, stripping the uber-villain of his newfound godhood. But what if? What if events occurred differently? What if Doom discovered his mistake before it was too late and won the Secret War? In other wordsWhat If Doctor Doom Kept the Beyonders Power?

And featuring the conclusion of a special five part back-up story, 'What if the Runaways Became the Young Avengers?' In this issue... Young Avengers Assemble!
name: What If...Doctor Doom Kept The Beyonder's Power;  What If The Runaways Became The Young Avengers, Part 5 (of 5)
The Revenge Syndicate
The Riddle of Dr. Riddle
The Canine Criminals
Introduce Bulletdog, Sensational Cainine Cop!
Great to be going on a little vacation, eh, ZR?

description: ECLIPSO: THE DARKNESS WITHIN Annuals Crossover Event continues. Reunited to steal a top-secret microchip, Deathstroke and Vigilante face the ominous shadow of Eclipso as he possesses Captain Hall. Unfortunately, things go from bad to worse as his trail of destruction leads them into conflict with Nightwing. Continues in New Teen Titans (1984) Annual #8.
name: A Thousand Points of Night
Golden Arrow and the Mad Medicine Man

description:
Guardian of Gotham!

Batman plummets from a five-story building - and things quickly get worse from there! The smartest man in Gotham is also the craziest...and he's somehow connected to Batman's past! (DC solicitation)
name: The Madmen of Gotham Part 3 of 3

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
Sonic the Hedgehog Archives #2 features more classic laughs and action. Each story is meticulously restored and printed on high-grade paper-so you can feel like you're zipping right alongside the cobalt crusader as he saves Knothole Village! So what are you waiting for? Put on your favorite pair of sneakers, grab a chilidog, start reading these thrilling collections and let the excitement begin!

Reprints issues 5-8 of Sonic the Hedgehog
name: Volume 2

description: A BROKEN TRINITY tie-in! In FIRST BORN, The Angelus power chose the troubled young woman Celestine as its host. Now, Celestines split personality struggles with The Angelus force for ultimate control, even as a rogue contingent of Angelus warriors plot their leaders overthrow.
A mysterious orphan on the streets of Rotterdam, no bigger than a bean, will change the world. Theres only one student at Battle School smarter than Ender WigginBean.
name: Part One

description: The future... Mankind has depleted the Earth's resources. Now, unexplained earthquakes, volcanoes and tidal waves wreak havoc on the planet. In the wake of this destruction, strange metal plates erupt from the Earth's crust. From these large disks emerge organic machines called Antibodies. Yuu Isami pilots an Antibody called a Grand Cher. Hime Utsumiya is the unlikely pilot of an Antibody called a Brain Powered. Yuu works for Orphan, a mysterious and sinister group of scientists who dwell in an ancient alien vessel that lies at the bottom of the sea. Hime's not a big fan of Orphan. When the two cross paths, their fates are bound to change...and so will that of the entire world.
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Bram Stoker's Burial of the Rats

description:
Ride to Vengeance!

The sun was a ball of molten wax hanging in a dust-dry sky and the five weary travelers who called themselves The Bravados had seen more of it than they wanted to remember! The faintest hint of a listless breeze had found them out in the wasteland and had finally let them here -- to this worm scab on the desert's blistering surface -- to a battered collection of dryrot shacks that called itself a town...

The Durgango Kid in Death Duel On Main Street!

Only two men on main street... only two men stalking forward with hands poised tensely over six-shooters -- and hearts boiling with hatred! And in a moment, one of those hearts will be stilled forever! For this is a Death Duel On Main Street!

Red Mask in The Man Who Rescued Redmask

He was only a poor prospector, but he had the unusual faculty of turning up just in time to rescue the great Redmask in Bullet's streets or on the open plains, Eben Fulton was always there to wrench The Crimson Cavalier out of trouble! This was putting the shoe on the other foot with a vengeance!... What was the secret of -- "The Man Who Rescued Redmask"

Billy Nevada in The Purple Back

As Billy Nevada drifts through the west, his life is suddenly complicated by the wild antics and the strong arm methods of a new and strange phenomenon known to the desert bad-men as... The Purple Back!

Men of the Law

They considered Bill just a bot, not quite ready for a man's job, but there was no escaping the fact that he was always on hand when there was trouble afoot, and the townsfolk thought twice about electing their deputy when it came voting time because Bill was a natural with Man of the Law
An anti-smoking message.
The exciting adventures of 13-year-old Marin Asagi and her alien robotic Gun-Swordsman Protector, Melan Blue, get off to a roaring start in this 1st volume.
name: Vol. 1

description: While on a rescue mission in Sydney, Team Omega brings back survivors infected with a deadly virus. And when this "Warhol Fever" manifests, all hell breaks loose on SkyWatch III. The NUMBER OF THE BEAST-related backup tale concludes from Christos Gage and artist Wes Craig!
name: A Day In The Life

description: Yuu and Hime engage in battle against the Reclaimers and win by the skin of their teeth. Upon reflection, they both come to realize that their greatest weakness lies within themselves and they strive to reconcile their differences in order to meet the challenge. Their cohesion and survival as a team depends on it!
name: Vol. 2

description: Jonathan, a Reclaimer, sneaks into Novis Noah to take over the ship, but instead discovers--much to his dismay--that he is the son of Novis Noah's captain, Anore McCormick. However, Captain McCormick doesn't have much time to ponder her son's hatred of her or his current alliance with the Reclaimers, as she soon finds herself being taken into the ocean by B Plate. Meanwhile, the Organic Engine Conference is held in Novis Noah where Yu's father finds his speech being challenged by 10-year-old genius Kanto Kestner. All the while, Orphan gradually begins to surface, throwing Earth's entire future into question.
name: Vol. 3

description: While fighting with Quincy, Yuu is taken by the Vital Globe to meet Nelly and her Brain Powered, who teach him that there are more effective ways to fight Orphan than succumbing to anger and hate. With Orphan now fully surfaced, its top commander is determined to save the Earth by using the power of the ship. Unhappy with the USA's attempts to acquire Orphan as their new state, the ship begins communicating with Hime and the Novis Noah BP pilots, who are then put in a tight spot as Orphan takes off into space with Quincy. As Yu and the Novis Noah BP's convince Orphan to release her, they discover that Orphan isn't an evil force, but an organic space ship looking for its other half...
name: Vol. 4

volume.name: Bram Stoker's Burial of the Rats
Bram Stoker's Burial of the Rats

description: What is the secret of Brigadoon? Why does it send the Monomakia to destroy Marin? In order to answer these questions, little Marin and her Gundswordsman protector Melan travel to the heart of danger, Brigadoon itself! With the lives of her friends and family back on Earth on the line, Melan will face her greatest opponents ever! The thrilling conclusion to the fantasy/sci-fi epic.
name: Vol. 2

description: The Mates race into space and attack the Ilian mothership but will even the combined super-powers of the world's great super-team be enough to stop an alien invasion? Thirty years later, Nick and Ethel look for that answer in a dusty storage locker. Whatever happens next, we need to get it in one take. Plus: a surprise guest appearance by one of the original Mates!
name: Helter-Skelter!
Pink Panther

description:
Written by John Wagner and illustrated by Steve Sampson - Brit-Cit Babes originally appeared in the first volume of the Judge Dredd Megazine in a five-part series (issues 16 to 20).

Brit-Cit, 2114, and working the sleazy streets of the future metropolis is Shea, an undercover Judge with Brit-Cit Vice. She's investigating the Iceman, a perp with a dangerous rep, but to get close to him she is going to have to immerse herself deep in the city's seedy criminal underbelly.

volume.name: Broken Halo: Is There Nothing Sacred

description: After a failed demon gun bust, Lt. Amark Buttercup's day went from bad to worse when his girlfriend, Holly Anders, walked out on him. Holly, however is hiding a secret; she helps smuggle demons into Nivarria. Now, Amark is trying to find a way to reconcile with her, not realizing that she has been possessed by the very demon that had slipped from his grasp during the raid the day before. Magical action and adventure from the popular Furrlough team of Christina "Smudge" Hanson and Ed Garcia!

After a failed demon gun bust, Lt. Amark Buttercup's day went from bad to worse when his girlfriend, Holly Anders, walked out on him. Holly, however is hiding a secret; she helps smuggle demons into Nivarria. Now, Amark is trying to find a way to reconcile with her, not realizing that she has been possessed by the very demon that had slipped from his grasp during the raid the day before. Magical action and adventure from the popular Furrlough team of Christina "Smudge" Hanson and Ed Garcia!

Trapped in unknown lands, Amark and Holly hide deep in the slums of the Demon City of Bylon. Meanwhile, the demoness Tarloom reports to Lord Sheilba that though she has found the location of Sheilba's errant son, she has inadvertently brought a unicorn into the Demon Lands. Enraged, Lord Sheilba commands a full scale hunt for Amark, wanting the unicorn's head before he leaves for Nivaria to kill his own son! Will Amark and Holly escape the Demon Lands alive, or will they be trapped forever?

The hunt is on! Amark races for his life carrying an unconscious Holly through the unfriendly demon city streets of Bylon, with the she-demon Tarloom all the while snapping at his heels. But Sheilba's Sorcerer Primus, Tahee, has his own plans for the hunted unicorn! Will the pair make it back home alive? Thrilling fantasy crime drama at its best!

Safe within the confines of Tahee's Lighthouse, Amark and Tahee come to an uneasy alliance to escape the Demon Lands. Soon they realize their best chance back to Mega-Shammark lies hidden within the demon Palace of Bylon and are off to sneak into Sheilba's home. Meanwhile, succubus Tarloom and the Lady of Tippikarie make a strange deal of their own as the two concoct evidence of Amark's "death" to appease Lord Sheilba.

Amark and Tahee, desperate to find the rune-stones that can take them back to Nivarria, comb through the demon Lord Sheilba's palace. The two, however, are discovered by Lord Sheilba himself and Tahee is severely injured in their escape! Amark does his level best to help his newfound colleague, but Tahee doesn't trust Amark to keep his end of the bargain! Will they be able to pull together to escape the Demon Lands?

Amark and Holly have finally made it back home from the Demon Lands! Together with Sgt. Yoko Saki, they race to Sharrdan's concert to try and stop Sheilba's assassination attempt. But things go badly when one of Sheilba's henchmen shoots the wrong person, causing the concert full of demons to panic! Now Amark and his crew have to successfully get Sharrdan and the band out safely before Lord Sheilba can find them!
Amark faces off against Lord Sheilba amongst the panicking concert. The thrilling conclusion of the Bureau of Mana Investigation series! Jam-packed with drama, action and magic!

volume.name: Captain America Goes to War Against Drugs
Captain America Meets the Asthma Monster!

description:
Commemorating Americas Bicentennial! Check out Captain Americas time-bending adventure as told by Marvel legend and Cap co-creator, Jack Kirby! A history lesson through the agesstarring the First Avenger!

Jack Kirby creates an over-sized treasury edition of everyone's favorite Red White and Blue Hero! Five chapters of pure fun all just in time for the Bicentennial. Hang onto you seats folks and enjoy the ride that starts with MISTER BUDA as he leads cap through a doorway through time into a book long journey.

1. Bedtime Stories (Inside front cover)

2. Party in the Attic

3. Dickie Bird's Dream

4. In the Deep, Deep Woods

5. [story on back cover]
name: Raggedy Ann & Andy

description: Collecting Captain America issues 372 - 378, Captain America: Streets of Poison follows Captain America as he decides to battle against the drug dealers running New York City. He learns of a new drug called ICE, and during his operation he comes into a large amount of the drug which alters his personality and lands him into confrontations with Avengers teammate Black Widow, his friend Diamondback along with street level crime fighter Daredevil. Also featuring appearances by Kingpin, Bullseye, Red Skull, and Crossbones.

volume.name: Captain Drew And His Crew Of Two

description: October 1962. A young pulp enthusiast is interviewing Willey Ley about an infamous 1947 story, "The Vril," in which he describes the Nazis' attempt to acquire a pan-ultimate universal power. Willey is haunted by memories of the past, and launches into a tale of a movie-inspired superhero and a global race to rescue a beautiful starlet amidst 1930s Hollywood and the growing Nazi regime. Captain Gravity: The Secret of the Vril, relaunches the popular Captain Gravity series in an adventure of gravitational proportions!

volume.name: Captain Gravity And The Power Of Vril

name: Tom and Jerry
Tom and Jerry

volume.name: Captain Drew And His Crew Of Two

description: Hollywood starlet Chase Dubois is off to Egypt with her jetsetter German boyfriend, Jan Gunter, for an archeological dig, a dig that has caught the attention of the American and British governments. It seems that Hitler has sent research teams out to study the origin of the swastika and the powers that be want to know why. As a spy on the early World War II battlegrounds, Chase follows Jan in an effort to catch him up to no good. But she isn't alone. Captain Gravity hovers just out of eyeshot to protect an important American commodity...and his best friend.

volume.name: Captain Gravity And The Power Of Vril

description: Captain Gravity encounters the Guardians of Thule in Libya and discovers that he is not the sole agent of gravity. Not only do the Guardians bend the force to their will, they also possess a far advanced knowledge of the power. Joshua must survive his attack in order to go to the source of Nazi control, Hitler's Berlin. But unknown to the Captain, a mysterious presence lurks beneath Hitler's headquarter, a presence that holds the keys to the world's destruction.

volume.name: Captain Gravity And The Power Of Vril

description: A trek to Berlin leaves Captain Gravity's Vril power spent. Not only must he fight the elements, but the Luftwaffe's most skilled pilots as well. Help from a legendary spy, however, puts the Captain back on track and unwittingly forces him on a collision course with an enemy from the past. In order to save Chase, Captain Gravity must face his worst fear.

volume.name: Captain Gravity And The Power Of Vril

description: The Captain must attempt an impossible trip that could cost him his sanity and his life. Not only does he fly without oxygen in extreme cold, but he also sees visions of his hoped-for future with Chase and the terrifying circumstances of his father's murder. In the meantime, Chase's "spy" network convinces C.F. Avery to practice a mysterious ritual in order to ensure the wellbeing of his two best friends. But will his efforts prove successful in the face of an incalculable evil determined to destroy Captain Gravity once and for all?

volume.name: Captain Gravity And The Power Of Vril
